title: Cost of a liver transplant on the National Health Service in the United Kingdom 2015
summary: More than 21 % of Mexican internet users surveyed in 2015 claimed they used Less_than_760 for finding dates .
Meanwhile , one out of four respondents cited 760-2300 and 9 % of people surveyed mentioned 2300-5000 .
Sex and solitude Approximately 42.7 % of Mexicans who used Health Service stated in 2017 that they did so in order to find friends .
gold: This statistic shows the results of a survey asking individuals in the United Kingdom how much they think the unit cost is to have a liver transplant on the NHS in 2015.
The average cost of a liver transplant is estimated to be 12,279 British pounds.
The majority of respondents , 64 percent , predicted the cost to be less than ten thousand British pounds .
